description.zh-cn: 指明仁宗朱高炽和明宣宗朱瞻基统治的时期。在此期间，明朝采取了宽松治国和息兵养民的政策，政治清平、百姓安居，是明代历史上的盛世之一。
description.en: Refers to the period ruled by the Hongxi Emperor (Zhu Gaochi) and the Xuande Emperor (Zhu Zhanji). During this time, the Ming dynasty adopted lenient governance and policies of recuperation, leading to political stability and a peaceful populace, marking one of the golden ages in Ming history.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第四位皇帝，明成祖朱棣长子。其统治时期与子明宣宗时期合称“仁宣之治”。他采取了多项息兵养民、发展生产的政策。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Ming dynasty, the eldest son of the Yongle Emperor. His reign, combined with that of his son the Xuande Emperor, is known as the 'Reign of Ren and Xuan'. He implemented various policies to cease military actions, allow the populace to recuperate, and develop production.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第五位皇帝，明仁宗朱高炽长子。其统治时期与父明仁宗时期合称“仁宣之治”。他平定叛乱，稳定国内局势，并延续了宽松的治国政策。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming dynasty, the eldest son of the Hongxi Emperor. His reign, combined with that of his father the Hongxi Emperor, is known as the 'Reign of Ren and Xuan'. He suppressed rebellions, stabilized the domestic situation, and continued the lenient governance policies.

description.zh-cn: 明朝重臣，“三杨”之一，历仕四朝。在仁宣时期担任内阁大学士，是“仁宣之治”的主要规划者和推动者之一。
description.en: An influential minister of the Ming dynasty, one of the 'Three Yangs', serving four emperors. During the Ren-Xuan period, he served as a Grand Secretary in the Inner Cabinet and was a key planner and promoter of the 'Reign of Ren and Xuan'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝重臣，“三杨”之一。在仁宣时期担任内阁大学士，是“仁宣之治”的重要辅臣。
description.en: An influential minister of the Ming dynasty, one of the 'Three Yangs'. During the Ren-Xuan period, he served as a Grand Secretary in the Inner Cabinet and was an important supporting minister of the 'Reign of Ren and Xuan'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝重臣，“三杨”之一。在仁宣时期担任内阁大学士，是“仁宣之治”的重要辅臣。
description.en: An influential minister of the Ming dynasty, one of the 'Three Yangs'. During the Ren-Xuan period, he served as a Grand Secretary in the Inner Cabinet and was an important supporting minister of the 'Reign of Ren and Xuan'.

description.zh-cn: 明仁宗、宣宗、英宗三朝的内阁辅臣杨士奇、杨荣、杨溥的合称。他们是仁宣之治的核心决策人物。
description.en: A collective term for the cabinet ministers Yang Shiqi, Yang Rong, and Yang Pu, who served during the reigns of Emperors Renzong, Xuanzong, and Yingzong. They were the core decision-makers of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明朝重臣，长期担任户部尚书。在仁宣时期是重要的辅政大臣，对息兵养民政策的实施有重要贡献。
description.en: An influential minister of the Ming dynasty who served as Minister of Revenue for a long period. He was a key regent minister during the Ren-Xuan period and made significant contributions to the implementation of policies for recuperation.

description.zh-cn: 明朝重臣，历仕六朝，长期担任吏部尚书。在仁宣时期是重要的辅政大臣。
description.en: An influential minister of the Ming dynasty who served six emperors and was the Minister of Personnel for a long period. He was a key regent minister during the Ren-Xuan period.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣统治时期，国家强盛、社会繁荣的时期。为仁宣之治奠定了基础。
description.en: The period of national strength and social prosperity during the reign of the Yongle Emperor (Zhu Di). It laid the foundation for the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，通过靖难之役夺取皇位。其统治时期被称为“永乐盛世”。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming dynasty, who seized the throne through the Jingnan campaign. His reign is known as the 'Yongle prosperity'.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣次子，封汉王。在宣宗即位后发动叛乱，被平定。
description.en: The second son of the Yongle Emperor, enfeoffed as the Prince of Han. He launched a rebellion after the Xuande Emperor's accession, which was suppressed.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗宣德元年，汉王朱高煦发动的叛乱，很快被宣宗御驾亲征平定。
description.en: A rebellion launched by Zhu Gaoxu, the Prince of Han, in the first year of the Xuande era. It was quickly suppressed by the Xuande Emperor who personally led the campaign.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣三子，封赵王。在朱高煦叛乱被平定后受到安抚，稳定了国内形势。
description.en: The third son of the Yongle Emperor, enfeoffed as the Prince of Zhao. He was appeased after the suppression of Zhu Gaoxu's rebellion, which helped stabilize the domestic situation.

description.zh-cn: 明代永乐、宣德年间的一系列远洋航海活动，由太监郑和率领。在仁宗即位后被一度停罢。
description.en: A series of maritime expeditions during the Yongle and Xuande eras of the Ming dynasty, led by the eunuch Zheng He. The voyages were temporarily halted after the Hongxi Emperor's accession.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，后在靖难之役中被其叔父朱棣推翻，下落不明。仁宗即位后赦免了其旧臣。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming dynasty, overthrown by his uncle Zhu Di in the Jingnan campaign, with his whereabouts becoming unknown. His former officials were pardoned upon the accession of the Hongxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的最高决策机构，由大学士组成，负责辅佐皇帝处理政务。仁宣之治的核心政策多出于此。
description.en: The highest decision-making body of the Ming dynasty, composed of Grand Secretaries who assisted the emperor in handling state affairs. Many core policies of the Reign of Ren and Xuan originated from it.

description.zh-cn: 明朝太监，明英宗时期的司礼监掌印太监。他擅权乱政，标志着仁宣之治的结束。
description.en: A Ming dynasty eunuch who served as the head of the Directorate of Ceremonial during the reign of the Yingzong Emperor. His usurpation of power and misgovernment marked the end of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗时期，太监王振凭借皇帝的信任而独揽大权，导致政治腐败，最终引发土木堡之变。其擅政标志着仁宣之治的结束。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Yingzong, the eunuch Wang Zhen monopolized power with the emperor's trust, leading to political corruption and eventually the Tumu Crisis. His rise to power marked the end of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第六位和第八位皇帝，明宣宗长子。九岁即位，初期由三杨等大臣辅政，后宠信太监王振，导致仁宣之治的成果衰退。
description.en: The sixth and eighth emperor of the Ming dynasty, eldest son of the Xuande Emperor. He ascended the throne at age nine, initially assisted by ministers like the Three Yangs, but later trusted the eunuch Wang Zhen, leading to the decline of the achievements of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明仁宗皇后，明宣宗之母，明英宗之祖母。在英宗即位初期，以太皇太后身份临朝，支持三杨等老臣，维护了仁宣之治的政治格局。
description.en: Empress of the Hongxi Emperor, mother of the Xuande Emperor, and grandmother of the Yingzong Emperor. In the early reign of Emperor Yingzong, she presided over the court as Empress Dowager, supported veteran ministers like the Three Yangs, and maintained the political structure of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗的第一任皇后，后被废。
description.en: The first empress of the Xuande Emperor, later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗的第二任皇后，明英宗的生母。
description.en: The second empress of the Xuande Emperor, biological mother of the Yingzong Emperor.

nodes.id: 交趾等处承宣布政使司

zh-cn: 交趾等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 明朝在安南（今越南北部）设立的行省。宣宗时期，因征讨屡次失利，最终决定放弃该地区。
description.en: A province established by the Ming dynasty in Annam (present-day northern Vietnam). During the Xuande era, after repeated military setbacks, the decision was made to abandon the region.

description.zh-cn: 明仁宗在位期间，采取了多项宽松治国和息兵养民的政策，开启了仁宣之治。
description.en: During his reign, the Hongxi Emperor adopted various lenient governance and recuperation policies, initiating the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗继位后，延续并发展了其父的治国方针，与明仁宗共同缔造了仁宣之治。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Xuande Emperor continued and developed his father's governing principles, jointly creating the Reign of Ren and Xuan with the Hongxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 作为内阁首辅，杨士奇是仁宣之治核心政策的主要制定者和推动者。
description.en: As the head of the Grand Secretariat, Yang Shiqi was a primary architect and promoter of the core policies of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 作为内阁大学士，杨荣是仁宣之治的重要辅臣。
description.en: As a Grand Secretary, Yang Rong was an important supporting minister of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 作为内阁大学士，杨溥是仁宣之治的重要辅臣。
description.en: As a Grand Secretary, Yang Pu was an important supporting minister of the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 作为户部尚书，夏原吉在仁宣时期的财政和民生政策中发挥了关键作用。
description.en: As Minister of Revenue, Xia Yuanji played a key role in the fiscal and livelihood policies of the Ren-Xuan period.

description.zh-cn: 作为吏部尚书，蹇义在仁宣时期的官员任免和吏治整顿中发挥了重要作用。
description.en: As Minister of Personnel, Jian Yi played an important role in the appointment, dismissal, and rectification of officials during the Ren-Xuan period.

description.zh-cn: 仁宣之治是在永乐盛世之后，进一步稳固了明朝的统治基础。
description.en: The Reign of Ren and Xuan followed the Yongle prosperity, further consolidating the ruling foundation of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明仁宗即位后，采纳杨士奇建议，下诏停罢下西洋宝船等事务。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Hongxi Emperor adopted Yang Shiqi's suggestion and issued an edict to halt matters such as the treasure ship voyages.

description.zh-cn: 明仁宗即位后，将尚在狱中的夏原吉释放并恢复其户部尚书原职。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Hongxi Emperor released Xia Yuanji from prison and restored him to his original post as Minister of Revenue.

description.zh-cn: 汉王朱高煦起兵谋反。
description.en: Zhu Gaoxu, the Prince of Han, raised troops in rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗御驾亲征，迅速平定了汉王朱高煦的叛乱。
description.en: The Xuande Emperor personally led a campaign and quickly suppressed the rebellion of Zhu Gaoxu, the Prince of Han.

description.zh-cn: 胡善祥是明宣宗的第一任皇后，后被废。
description.en: Hu Shanxiang was the first empress of the Xuande Emperor, but was later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 孙氏在胡善祥被废后，被立为明宣宗的皇后。
description.en: After Hu Shanxiang was deposed, Lady Sun was installed as the empress of the Xuande Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗以皇后无子多病为由，废黜了胡善祥的皇后之位。
description.en: The Xuande Emperor deposed Empress Hu Shanxiang on the grounds of her being childless and frequently ill.

description.zh-cn: 在张太皇太后去世、三杨年老后，王振开始独揽大权，干预朝政。
description.en: After the death of Grand Empress Dowager Zhang and as the Three Yangs aged, Wang Zhen began to monopolize power and interfere in court politics.

description.zh-cn: 王振的擅政导致明朝政治腐败，仁宣之治所创造的基业也随之衰退。
description.en: Wang Zhen's usurpation of power led to political corruption in the Ming dynasty, causing the decline of the achievements established during the Reign of Ren and Xuan.

description.zh-cn: 在明英宗即位之初，张太皇太后曾召见王振并意图将其处死，以防其干政。
description.en: At the beginning of Emperor Yingzong's reign, Grand Empress Dowager Zhang summoned Wang Zhen with the intention of executing him to prevent his interference in politics.

description.zh-cn: 当张太皇太后欲处死王振时，年幼的明英宗跪下求情，使其得以幸免。
description.en: When Grand Empress Dowager Zhang intended to execute Wang Zhen, the young Emperor Yingzong knelt and pleaded for him, allowing him to be spared.

relationships.target: 交趾等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 在杨士奇、杨荣力劝下，明宣宗决定放弃对交趾的征讨，并赦免其罪。
description.en: Persuaded by Yang Shiqi and Yang Rong, the Xuande Emperor decided to abandon the military campaigns in Jiaozhi and pardoned its offenses.
